extension.dc:title: EOL References Extension 1.0
extension.dc:description: This extension draws from BIBO (http://bibliontology.com/), Dublin Core and others to gather information about citations and bibliographic references.
extension.name: EOLReferencesExtension

property.name: identifier
property.dc:description: An identifier for a resource that is referenced, cited, or otherwise pointed to by a taxon or media resource.

property.name: publicationType
property.dc:description: book, journal, journal article, webpage, etc

property.name: full_reference
property.dc:description: A complete bibliographic citation describing the resource. Use of this field will cause the more specific fields here to be ignored.

property.name: primaryTitle
property.dc:description: Used to describe the title of a bibliographic resource.

property.name: title
property.dc:description: Used to describe the title of an artlcle or chapter

property.name: pages
property.dc:description: A string of non-contiguous page spans that locate a Document within a Collection. Example: 23-25, 34, 54-56. For continuous page ranges, use the pageStart and pageEnd properties.

property.name: pageStart
property.dc:description: Starting page number within a continuous page range.

property.name: pageEnd
property.dc:description: Ending page number within a continuous page range.

property.name: edition
property.dc:description: The name defining a special edition of a document. Normally its a literal value composed of a version number and words.

property.name: publisher
property.dc:description: Used to link a bibliographic item to its publisher.

property.name: authorList
property.dc:description: An ordered list of authors. Normally, this list is seen as a priority list that order authors by importance. Last name, first

property.name: editorList
property.dc:description: An ordered list of editors. Normally, this list is seen as a priority list that order editors by importance.

property.name: created
property.dc:description: The date of the creation for the original resource from which the digital media was derived or created.

property.name: language
property.dc:description: Language of resource itself represented in ISO639-1 or ISO639-3.

property.name: uri
property.dc:description: Universal Resource Identifier of a document.

property.name: doi
property.dc:description: Digital Object Identifier (DOI) for identifying the resource.

property.name: localityName
property.dc:description: Used to name the locality of a publisher, an author, etc.
